technique.name: passing the horizon
technique.attack: rear right-arm hammer lock with a left hand wrist grab

steps.step: Regrab your opponent's right wrist with your right hand. step back toward 6:00 into a forward bow as you thrust your left hand forward releasing from the wrist grab.
pivot into a neutral bow as you execute a outward elbow to your opponent's face.
step toward 1:30 into a neutral bow as you rotate your opponent's right wrist to the right (clockwise), bending him forward.
Execute a front snap to your opponent's ribs.
